--- title: "Hello, Tiny Data World" description: "Kicking off this blog with a microscopic dataset." date: 2025-11-22 categories: [intro, meta] format: html: toc: false code-fold: false --- This is my very first tiny data story. Right now, the goal is just to make sure everything works: the blog, the code, and the render. So here's a microscopic dataset to launch this thing. ::: {#d1555e4f .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.DataFrame({ "fruit": ["apple", "banana", "kiwi"], "rating": [8, 6, 9] }) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
fruit rating
0 apple 8
1 banana 6
2 kiwi 9
``` ::: :::
